__NOTOC__ void '''SetSkyScrollSpeed''' (int ''sky'', fixed ''skyspeed'');
== Usage ==
Changes the scrolling speed of a [[sky]]. This is useful in conjunction with [[ChangeSky]].
=== Parameters ===
* ''sky'': either 1 or 2. * ''skyspeed'': the desired scrolling speed.
== Examples == script 1 {{SType|Enter}} { [[SetSkyScrollSpeed]] (1, 155); // Or 0.002365, since the speed is a [[fixed point]] value }
== See also == * [[ChangeSky]]
